page.title: 08PIG FARM
page.content: THe pig farm opened in 1974 with 5 boars and 105 {Landrace Sows}.The {Gestation}period rof pigs is 105 days and then they have to be kept for 20 weeks before they are ready to sell. The pigs are taken every week in a slatted sided trailer to one of 4 slaughter houses.The pigs,grouped by size,are kept in {large pens}holding 12-22 pigs.Twice a day the pigs are {inspected}to ensure good health .A 100 tons of feed is used monthly.The pemises are visited often by the { {Ministry of Agriculture}.Returns are sent regularly to the Ministry of Agriculture.Many more pork products are eaten today than 10 years ago. The future of the pig industry is not guaranteed because there is much competition from the E.E.C. countries. Few pigs are exported .
